column4: I cant startx after installing dapper on my inspiron 9300 laptop. I did try few things peaple on this channel told me to try like reconfiguring my xserver-xorg but no luck. system just hangs  just before it would startx. I see quite few errors at the beginning but dont know where to look
most likely this is a display driver problem
are you sure you have chosen the right options
soundray there is no errors that I can see in /var/log/Xorg.0.log. Its also not possible to startx becoouse the system hangs before it should startx. I can only boot with recovery mode
